mapper.sql: select r.restarea_idx, substr(r.name,1, instr(r.name,'휴게소')-1) name, rf.img, rf.name foodname from restarea r, restarea_food rf
mapper.select: where r.restarea_idx=rf.restarea_idx and do_idx=8 and main_chk='y' and not r.restarea_idx=12 and rownum<=3
where r.restarea_idx=rf.restarea_idx and do_idx=1 and main_chk='y' and rownum<=3
where r.restarea_idx=rf.restarea_idx and do_idx=2 and main_chk='y' and rownum<=3
where r.restarea_idx=rf.restarea_idx and do_idx=3 and main_chk='y' and rownum<=3
select restarea_idx, name, lng, lat from restarea
